Article Title: How to use WhatsApp's new Forward to Channel feature: things to keep in mind and more
Article Text:
WhatsApp's new Forward to Channel feature allows admins to share updates from other channels. Follow the guide to forward an update, remembering the 'Forwarded' label, visibility, guidelines, and limitations. Public updates and transparency are key. Use the steps provided for efficient sharing while complying with WhatsApp's review process.

Forwarded label

:

Forwarded updates will have a "Forwarded" label, indicating the update was not authored by you and providing a link to the original channel.

Visibility:

Public updates :



All updates, including forwards, are public. Followers can see all updates shared since they followed the channel. Non-followers can view up to 30 days' worth of update history on your channel.

:

Guidelines:

WhatsApp reviews all channel updates against its guidelines, ensuring the content adheres to the platform's standards.

Forwarding limitations :



You can only forward a channel update to one channel at a time. Forwarded updates cannot be edited once they are shared to your channel.

:

How to Forward a Channel Update to Your Channel

Open WhatsApp and Go to the updates tab:

Start by opening the WhatsApp app and navigating to the Updates tab. Open the Desired channel:

Find and open the channel that contains the update you wish to forward. Select the update to forward:

Hover over the update you want to forward. Click on the menu (three dots) and select Forward. Choose your channel:

Select the channel to which you want to forward the update. Send the update:

Click Send. The update will now appear in your channel with a "Forwarded" label and a link to the original channel.

WhatsApp's new Forward to Channel feature allows channel admins to share updates from other channels to their own. This guide will walk you through the steps to forward a channel update and provide important information to keep in mind.But, before diving into the steps, there are certain things that you should know about using the feature.Using these steps, you can efficiently share updates from other channels to your own, expanding your content while maintaining transparency with your audience.Remember that all shared content is public and subject to WhatsApp's review process, so always ensure your updates comply with the guidelines.
Article Summary: WhatsApp's new Forward to Channel feature allows admins to share updates from other channels to their own. Follow the guide to forward an update, remembering the 'Forwarded' label, visibility, guidelines, and limitations. Public updates and transparency are key. Use the steps provided for efficient sharing while complying with WhatsApp's review process.

Article Title: How hackers may make it difficult for Taylor Swift fans to attend Eras Tour concerts
Article Text:
What the hackers have threatened



What Ticketmaster has to say



"Ticketmaster's SafeTix technology protects tickets by automatically refreshing a new and unique barcode every few seconds so it cannot be stolen or copied. This is just one of many fraud protections we implement to keep tickets safe and secure."

Hackers have reportedly leaked the ticket details of one of Taylor Swift 's concerts. According to a report by Bleeping Computers, event ticketing company Ticketmaster has claimed that it's facing a potential security breach .Cyberattackers associated with the group Sp1d3rHunters (formerly Sp1d3r) have reportedly claimed to have leaked barcode data for 166,000 tickets to Taylor Swift's Eras Tour .The report claims that the barcode data is for upcoming Taylor Swift concerts in Miami, New Orleans and Indianapolis. The ongoing tour started last year and will continue till December 2024.Ticketmaster has not yet commented on the situation, and the authenticity of the leaked data remains unverified. If it turns out to be true, it may leave a significant number of fans unable to attend the concerts.The hackers have allegedly demanded a ransom of $2 million from the company to prevent them from leaking data for other events.This extortion demand , which was first shared by threat intel service HackManac, reads:"Pay us $2 million or we leak all 680 million of your user's information and 30 million more event barcodes including more Taylor Swift events, P!nk, Sting, Sporting events F1 Formula Racing, MLB, NFL and thousands more events.‚ÄùSp1d3rHunters is known for extorting companies after stealing data from Snowflake accounts.The hackers have also claimed that the leaked data isn't just ticket barcodes but also includes information to create scannable barcodes (like stripes and numbers) along with details like seat location and ticket price.The group even provided instructions on turning this data into functioning barcodes. This leak seems connected to a larger Ticketmaster data breach in May, as some details like hashed credit card info match the previous leak.In a statement to Bleeping Computer, Ticketmaster said that unique barcodes are updated every few seconds, so the stolen tickets cannot be used.The company said:
Article Summary: Hackers have reportedly leaked the ticket details of one of Taylor Swift's concerts. Ticketmaster has claimed that it's facing a potential security breach. If it turns out to be true, it may leave a significant number of fans unable to attend the concerts.

Article Title: Government has issued an important warning for this loan app
Article Text:
CyberDost warns users about CashExpand-U Finance Assistant - Loan app's association with hostile foreign entities. The app has been removed from Google Play Store. Users advised to uninstall the app and delete all data associated with it from their devices.

What does the post read

What‚Äôs the warning

What should users do

CyberDost , the government cybercrime department has issued an important warning for a loan app. The government body has issued a warning about the CashExpand-U Finance Assistant - Loan app via a post on X (formerly Twitter). The app has also been removed from Google Play Store .‚ÄúBeware! The CashExpand-U Finance Assistant - Loan app is learnt to be associated with hostile foreign entities .#LoanApps #Cybercrime #DigitalSafety #Lending #I4C #MHA #Cyberdost #Cybersecurity #CyberSafeIndia @RBI @GooglePlay @FinMinIndia‚ÄùAccording to the post, Cyberdost has mentioned that the CashExpand-U Finance Assistant - Loan app is associated with ‚Äúhostile foreign entities‚Äù. The government body has not disclosed the specifics of the warning in the post.It is worth mentioning that the app is no longer listed on Google Play Store. Before it was removed the app had over 1 lakh downloads, a 4.4 rating with 7.19K reviews.Users who use the app or have it installed on their smartphones should uninstall it immediately.To remove the app, head to smartphone settings, then tap on ‚ÄúApp‚Äù. Look for the app and tap on it.On the next page, tap on ‚ÄúUninstall‚Äù button at the bottom of the screen.That‚Äôs it! The app will be uninstalled from the app.Another important thing to keep in mind is to remove the account and data associated with the app before uninstalling it from the device.
Article Summary: The CashExpand-U Finance Assistant - Loan app has been removed from Google Play Store. Users advised to uninstall the app and delete all data associated with it from their devices. Before it was removed the app had over 1 lakh downloads, a 4.4 rating with 7.19K reviews.

Article Title: How Russian hackers who spied on Microsoft executives tried to access two government agencies‚Äô secrets
Article Text:
Russian hackers tried to check stolen codes

Microsoft Security Team, earlier this year, announced that it detected a nation-state cyber attack by Russian hackers , who were able to access the company‚Äôs corporate email systems. The Microsoft Threat Intelligence identified the hacking group as Midnight Blizzard , and now a report has said that two US government departments were impacted by the breach.As per a recent report by Bloomberg, the US Department of Veterans Affairs and an arm of the US State Department are among a growing list of Microsoft customers who said that they were impacted by the hacking.The report cited a spokesperson of the US Agency for Global Media as saying that ‚Äúa few months ago‚Äù Microsoft notified the department that some of its data may have been stolen, a spokesperson said.‚ÄúWe are aware that Microsoft is reaching out to agencies, both affected and unaffected, in the spirit of transparency,‚Äù a State Department spokesperson said.The agency is a part of the State Department that provides news and information in countries where the press is restricted. The spokesperson, however, noted that no security or sensitive personally identifiable data was compromised and that the agency is working closely with the Department of Homeland Security.The Department of Veterans Affairs also said in March, it was notified that it was affected by the Microsoft breach.Microsoft disclosed the breach in January, attributing it to Midnight Blizzard. The company said that the Russian hacking group accessed corporate email accounts and warned of potential attempts to exploit shared secrets between them and customers.According to the report, hackers used a single set of credentials stolen from the emails they accessed to break into a test environment on the VA‚Äôs Microsoft Cloud account around January. The authorities also said that the intrusion lasted one second apparently because Midnight Blizzard intended to verify that the credentials were valid.The agency changed the exposed credentials, along with login details to its Microsoft environments, as soon as it was notified of the intrusion.‚ÄúAs our investigation continues, we have reached out to customers to notify them if they have corresponded with a Microsoft corporate email account that has been accessed,‚Äù a Microsoft spokesperson said.
Article Summary: US Department of Veterans Affairs and an arm of the US State Department are among a growing list of Microsoft customers who said that they were impacted by the hacking. Microsoft Security Team, earlier this year, announced that it detected a nation-state cyber attack by Russian hackers. The Microsoft Threat Intelligence identified the hacking group as Midnight Blizzard.

Article Title: 4 records that this Instagram post of Virat Kohli on World Cup win made
Article Text:
Virat Kohli‚Äôs

Instagram post

Here's how it broke the internet

Virat Kohli announced retirement from T20 playing format

Indian cricketer Virat Kohli 's social media reign continues! Following India's thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup final, Kohli took to Instagram to express his joy, and in doing so, shattered several records on the platform.Kohli's celebratory post featuring a picture of him embracing teammate Rohit Sharma became an instant viral sensation.The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes and counting at the time of writing.Kohli's caption, simply stating "Couldn't have dreamt of a better day than this. God is great and I bow my head in gratitude. We finally did it üáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èüáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èjai hind ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è," resonated deeply with fans across the nation.First Indian to hit 20M likes on a postKohli's post surpassed the previous record held by Bollywood couple Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra's wedding announcement. With millions of likes pouring in, it became the most liked post ever by an Indian account.First Asian athlete to hit 20M likes on a postHis post became the first by an Asian athlete to surpass the coveted milestone of 20 million likes.2nd Asian hit 20M likes on a postKohli further cemented his social media dominance by becoming the second Asian individual (all categories) to achieve the 20 million like mark on a single post.5th Athlete in the World to hit 20M likes on a postThe global sporting community joined the celebration. Kohli's post became the top 5 most liked posts by athletes worldwide, showcasing his immense global fanbase.Virat Kohli's post resonated with millions, capturing the joy and relief of a nation celebrating a long-awaited victory.Virat Kohli announced his retirement from the T20 International format after leading his team to a thrilling victory in the 2024 T20 World Cup final. "This was my last T20 game playing for India," Kohli declared. "This World Cup was the perfect culmination for this chapter in my career. Time for the next generation to take the T20 game forward."
Article Summary: Virat Kohli's post became the first by an Asian athlete to surpass the coveted milestone of 20 million likes. The post surpassed the previous record held by Bollywood couple Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra's wedding announcement. It became the most liked post ever by an Indian account.

Article Title: Elon Musk responds to Chinese girl who wants him to fix a bug in Tesla screen: Watch
Article Text: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, has shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen.In a short video posted on X (formerly Twitter), Molly highlighted the issue she is facing with the touchscreen in her Tesla car. When she tries to draw on the touchscreen, previously drawn lines disappear as she adds new ones.With wide eyes and a clear explanation, she asks Mr. Musk to "fix an error" on her Tesla.The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself. Responding to the video, Musk simply replied "Sure," sparking further conversation online.Shared on X (formerly Twitter), the post quickly gained traction, garnering over a million views and 16,000 likes from users. Many users have also reacted to the video.Here are some of the reactions‚Äúthis is a critical issue @elonmusk please fix it‚Äù‚ÄúOh please this is very concerning @elonmusk ! Help her‚Äù‚Äúhalt all production until we resolve. please and thank you.‚Äù‚ÄúAwww, she‚Äôs so adorable‚Äù
Article Summary: A young Tesla owner in China has shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen. The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself.

Article Title: Apple MacBook models with M4 chipsets may come with ‚Äòpaid‚Äô AI features
Article Text:
Apple MacBook models with M4 chipset: Expected availability



Apple MacBook Pro models with M4 chipsets: What to expect



Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. According to a report by Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman, the rumoured MacBook Pro and MacBook Air machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets -- the base M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max chipsets. The report also notes that the upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service which is expected to boost sales.Rumours suggest that Apple will soon release 14-inch and 16-inch models of MacBook Pros with M4 chips by the end of this year or early next year. Moreover, MacBook Air sizes are also in line for an early 2025 refresh.Currently, the only Apple devices with the M4 chip are the newest iPad Pro models . The most affordable option is the 11-inch iPad Pro with 256GB of storage which was launched at Rs 99,900.Gurman claims that both the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air won't see any design changes despite getting upgraded to the M4 chipsets. This comes after the 2021 redesign of the MacBook Pro with the M1 chip.He also suggested that a more significant visual overhaul might be coming in 2026, potentially coinciding with the adoption of OLED displays similar to the latest iPad Pro models.Similarly, the MacBook Air is also expected to wait until 2027 for a design refresh, five years after it departs from the wedge shape.Gurman acknowledges that a chip upgrade alone might not be enough to entice existing MacBook users to upgrade.To address this, Apple is reportedly considering a monthly subscription service that builds upon the free Apple Intelligence launching this fall.Additionally, Gurman claims Apple might integrate and potentially take a commission on third-party AI services like ChatGPT, mirroring their App Store model.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. The rumoured machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets. The upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service.

Article Title: iQoo Z9 Lite 5G smartphone to launch in India on July 15: Here‚Äôs what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
iQoo Z9 Lite confirmed details

iQoo Z9 Lite expected specs and price

iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker iQoo has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15.The company posted on X (formerly known as Twitter) about the upcoming iQoo launch. ‚ÄúTaking it slow? - no more! A #FullyLoaded5G experience awaits you! #iQOOZ9Lite,‚Äù reads the post.Along with the launch date, iQoo has also shared a teaser image of the upcoming iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone.The company has confirmed that the yet-to-launch iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will sport a dual rear camera setup. The smartphone will feature a flat rear panel and display. The dual rear camera is placed inside a rectangular module located at the top left corner.The smartphone maker has also confirmed that the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will pack an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 6GB of RAM. The smartphone will offer 128GB internal storage.iQoo Z9 Lite is said to sport a 6.56-inch HD+ LCD display which is expected to offer up to 90Hz of refresh rate. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor.The smartphone is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and house a 5000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.Multiple online rumours suggest that the iQoo Z9 Lite may come with a starting price tag of Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor. It is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

Article Title: Credit card cyber fraud: Essential steps to safeguard your finance
Article Text:
Best tips to protect from credit card cyber fraud

Monitor account activity: Regularly review your credit card statements and transaction history for any unauthorised charges or suspicious activity.

Enable alerts: Set up transaction alerts through your bank or credit card issuer to receive notifications of any transactions made with your card.

Use strong and unique passwords: Secure your online banking and shopping accounts with strong passwords that include a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters. Avoid using information that is easily guessed, such as birth dates and names.

Enable 2-factor authentication: Utilise two-factor authentication (2FA) wherever possible to add an extra layer of security to your online accounts.

Be cautious of phishing scams: Avoid clicking on links or downloading attachments from unsolicited emails, messages, or websites that ask for your credit card information.

Shop only on secure websites: Ensure that the websites you use for online shopping are secure. To ensure secure browsing, ensure that the URL contains HTTPS and a padlock symbol in the address bar.

Use virtual credit card numbers: Some banks offer virtual credit card numbers for online transactions. These are temporary numbers that cannot be linked to your actual credit card account.

Keep your devices secure: Install antivirus software, keep your operating system and apps updated, and avoid connecting to unsecured public Wi-Fi networks when making online transactions.

Shred personal documents: Shred any documents containing sensitive information such as credit card statements or receipts before disposing of them.

Report lost or stolen cards immediately: Contact your bank or credit card issuer immediately if your card is lost or stolen to prevent unauthorised use.

Also read

Credit card fraud involves cybercriminals obtaining sensitive credit card information such as the card number, PIN, CVV, and other necessary details to make unauthorised purchases or transfers.While credit card fraud detection systems can aid in identifying fraudulent transactions to some extent, fraudsters often manage to inflict substantial financial harm on victims before being apprehended.Therefore, it's crucial to familiarise oneself with various types of credit card fraud and take proactive measures to avoid becoming a victim. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.Despite the low or zero liabilities for credit card users, fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. While the bank's zero-liability policy protects credit card users from financial losses if they report the fraud within 60 days, they must endure the process of detecting the theft, notifying the bank, obtaining a replacement card, paying any associated fees, and updating all automatic payment accounts.The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud, helping banks address potential issues proactively.
Article Summary: The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud. Fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.

Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Jio has announced a price increase for all its prepaid and postpaid plans, effective from today, July 3. The new tariff prices will be implemented across all touchpoints and channels. The most affordable plan, now priced at Rs 189, was previously Rs 155, marking a 22% rise. It's important to note that despite the price hike, the plan benefits such as call minutes and data allowance will remain unchanged.The telecom service provider has announced the price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans.Here‚Äôs a list of all the plans:The new tariff plans feature various price adjustments for popular monthly, bi-monthly, quarterly, annual, data add-on, and postpaid options. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449 (increased from Rs 155 to Rs 399). Bi-monthly plans are priced between Rs 579 and Rs 629 for data ranging from 1.5GB/day to 2GB/day over 56 days. Quarterly plans are available from Rs 479 to Rs 1199, offering 6GB to 3GB/day over 84 days. Annual plans range from Rs 1899 to Rs 3599.Note that once the price hike goes into effect, the unlimited 5G data will only be available with plans offering 2GB/day data or above.
Article Summary: Reliance Jio announces price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449, with data offerings. Quarterly and annual plans also see adjustments. Telecom service provider ensures unchanged benefits amidst the price hike.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

Begin by starting the Indian Bike Driving 3D game on your device.

Look for the button featuring a phone icon, typically located at the bottom left corner of the game screen. Click on this icon to open the phone menu.

Within the phone menu, find the handset icon, usually coloured green and positioned in the middle. Click on this icon to proceed.

Upon clicking the handset icon, a contact list will appear on the screen. Look for an icon featuring nine orange circles at the bottom left corner of this screen. Click on it to access the number entry interface.

In the number entry interface, use your device's keypad to input one of the provided cheat codes. Each cheat code corresponds to a specific reward mentioned in the description.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT after India‚Äôs Cricket World Cup win
Article Text:
Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT

‚ÄúHello Chat GPT 4.O

Please make me a graphic image showing the Indian Cricket team as Superheroes.

Because they were SuperCool till the end.

The greatest gift of this final to India was that it didn‚Äôt come easy. It almost slipped out of their grasp. But they never lost the match in their minds.

Reminding all of us that being a Superhero never comes without a fierce determination to win and a Never Give In attitude.

Jai Ho! #IndiavsSA #T20WorldCupFinal‚Äù reads the post.

Here how users reacted to the post

Team India becomes T20 World Cup 2024 champions

Mahindra Group chairman Anand Mahindra is known for his active social media presence and witty remarks. Following India's dominating victory against South Africa in the T20 World Cup final, Mahindra posted a congratulatory message on X (formerly known as Twitter) with the help of ChatGPT .Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team, requesting that the cricketers be depicted as superheroes.Mahindra also shared the ChatGPT-generated image on X. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag.Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final. After a tense battle against South Africa at the iconic Kensington Oval, India emerged champions with a narrow seven-run win. Virat Kohli's dominant 76 and Rohit Sharma 's sharp captaincy were instrumental in securing the win. Following the game, Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from the T20 format.
Article Summary: Anand Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag. Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final.

Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo üá¨üáß2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar üáÆüá≥üèÜ," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious üòÇ #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 üò§," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. ‚ÄúHitman has once again added hope to the cart üôè," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: Microsoft Xbox server outage fixed, here‚Äôs what the company said
Article Text:
What caused the Xbox outage?

Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide who were unable to sign into their Xbox accounts. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running.The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST and lasted for several hours till morning next day.Xbox started an investigation which lasted for hours.However, the company did not reveal the exact reason of what resulted in the outage, but kept continuously updating users about it.After the service was restored, official handle of Xbox Support on X (formerly Twitter) said ‚ÄúUsers should no longer be encountering issues signing in to Xbox Live and services. Thank you for your patience, game on!‚Äù.As per Downdetector, thousands of Xbox Live users were affected by the outage. The company said that it was ‚Äúaware that some users have been disconnected from Xbox Live. We're investigating! Please follow here and on our status page for updates. http://Xbox.com/status‚Äù.While the status page read ‚ÄúYou may not be able to sign-in to your Xbox profile, may be disconnected while signed in, or have other related problems,‚Äù the notice read. ‚ÄúFeatures that require sign-in like most games, apps and social activity won‚Äôt be available.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running. The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max may offer longer battery life
Article Text:
Apple to use steel battery case to tackle overheating

Apple iPhone 16 series rumours

Apple iPhone 16 series is expected to launch in September and in the run up to the debut, the rumour mill is already churning out scores of leaks. According to another such leak, iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life .Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max, which will result in longer battery life.‚ÄúMy latest supply chain survey indicates the energy density (Wh/kg) of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase, which has the benefit of longer battery life with the same battery size or lower battery size with the same battery life,‚Äù he said in a post.However, with increase in energy density of the battery cells, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case .‚ÄúIncreasing the energy density of the battery cells will increase the battery temperature when running. To avoid overheating the battery, Apple uses the stainless steel battery case for the first time as a thermal solution ,‚Äù Kuo said.While stainless steel may not be as effective as aluminium in dissipating heat, ‚Äúit is more robust and less susceptible to corrosion, so in addition to dissipating heat, the stainless steel battery case provides better protection for the battery and the iPhone system.‚ÄùKuo noted that the use of a stainless steel battery case will reduce the difficulty of removing the battery, hence, helping Apple to ‚Äúcomply with the European Union‚Äôs requirements for mobile phone batteries‚Äô replaceability in the future.‚Äù‚ÄúIf the mass production of this new battery design (upgraded energy density of battery cells & adoption of the stainless steel battery case) goes well and the feedback is favourable, this new battery design will be adopted in all 2H25 new iPhone models,‚Äù Kuo noted.The iPhone 16 series is rumoured to replace physical buttons with touch-sensitive buttons that simulate a press with haptic feedback. The camera layout might shift to a vertical design, unlike the current diagonal setup. The customisable Action button, currently on Pro models, might be available on all iPhone 16 models.Under the hood, the standard iPhone 16 and Plus models might use the A18 chip , while Pro models could get the A18 Pro chip. Meanwhile, the display size for iPhone 16 and Plus (6.1-inch and 6.7-inch) might remain the same, but the refresh rate could improve.
Article Summary: iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life. Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells. With increase in energy density, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case.
